price: 168 « Si seulement nous possédions des Ecritures comme nos devanciers,
arabic: لَوۡ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكۡرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: law anna ʿindanā dhik'ran mina al-awalīna
